data.title: Centerville, Tennessee Current Local Time and Time Zone
data.meta_description: Current local time in Centerville, Tennessee with information about Centerville, Tennessee official time zones and daylight saving time.
data.text:
Current Local Time

Centerville, Tennessee is officially in the Central Time Zone

The Current Time in

Centerville, Tennessee is:

Wednesday

8/14/2024

6:30 AM

CDT

Centerville, Tennessee

is in the

Central Time Zone

Time Zone

Abbreviations

Central Standard Time - is abbreviated as CST

Central Daylight Time - is abbreviated as CDT

UTC - GMT

Offset

Centerville, Tennessee is GMT/UTC - 6h during Standard Time

Centerville, Tennessee is GMT/UTC - 5h during Daylight Saving Time

Daylight Saving

Start Date

Centerville, Tennessee starts Daylight Saving Time on

Sunday March 10, 2024 at 2:00 AM local time.
